mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, OVERHAUL_DATE AS overhaulDate, OVERHAUL_GUBUN AS overhaulGubun FROM ATMS_OVERHAUL_PLAN

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, OVERHAUL_DATE AS overhaulDate, OVERHAUL_GUBUN AS overhaulGubun FROM ATMS_OVERHAUL_PLAN WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_OVERHAUL_PLAN WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, OVERHAUL_DATE = #{overhaulDate}
INSERT INTO ATMS_OVERHAUL_PLAN ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, OVERHAUL_DATE, OVERHAUL_GUBUN ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{overhaulDate}, #{overhaulGubun} )
